name: Fantasy Kingdom
description:
Follow the story of Garret, a retired knight who just wanted to grow peppers and herbs in the mountains.  But woe, the kingdom he used to protect is under siege by dark forces and he must stop them.

A simple turn-based fantasy RPG made with assets in RPG Maker Vx Ace, no additional scripts.  This is the first version of the first game I made in RPG Maker, I still consider it in progress and there are spelling issues all over the place.

The comments are open for comments, critics, and suggestions.
